30911.name: Pesticides: Pesticides - Average use per area of cropland (FAO (2017))
30911.description: The data describe the average use of pesticides per area of cropland (arable land and permanent crops) at national level in a time series from 1990 to 2014.

source.name: Pesticides - FAO (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)
source.dataPublisherSource: Primary data source: FAO Questionnaire on Pesticides Use and Land. These official statistics may be complemented with government data sources such as yearbooks and ministerial data portals. Data gaps may be filled with secondary sources such as country studies from other International organizations. Data are flagged according to the type of data and the source.
source.additionalInfo:
: 
The indicator is defined as the annual agricultural use of total pesticides (Fungicides & Bactericides, Herbicides, Insecticides, Plant Growth Regulators, Seed Treatment Fungicides, Seed Treatment Insecticides, Mineral Oils, Rodenticides, and Disinfectants) divided by the area of croplands (arable and permanent crops).
